description: Opts out a speaker from Voice ID. A speaker can be opted out regardless of whether or not they already exist in Voice ID. If they don't yet exist, a new speaker is created in an opted out state. If they already exist, their existing status is overridden and they are opted out. Enrollment and evaluation authentication requests are rejected for opted out speakers, and opted out speakers have no voice embeddings stored in Voice ID.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the speaker.

parameters.name: SpeakerId
parameters.description: The identifier of the speaker you want opted-out.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when the speaker was created.

nested_items.name: CustomerSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The client-provided identifier for the speaker.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the speaker.

nested_items.name: GeneratedSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier for the speaker.

nested_items.name: LastAccessedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the speaker was last accessed for enrollment, re-enrollment or a successful authentication. This timestamp is accurate to one hour.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the speaker.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of the speaker's last update.
